descriptionHtml:
A simple bat file that reveals all undiscovered map markers, including DLCs and added by other mods.

Compatibility: All
Incompatibility: None

No .esp or scripts. Does not occupy slot in your load list.

installation;
Extract the text file and place the folder where this TESV.exe. Do not place in the DATA folder.In game, open the console and type comand: BAT SHOW

Please do not use any mod manager, this file should not be placed in the data folder but where is located the TESV.exe

Important:
In fact, you do not need to install this file or put in any folder, simply open the console and type: "TMM, 1,0,0" (without quotes) and all locations are shown in black, indicating that not was discovered and is not available via fast travel.

This mod is for people like me who already have hundreds and hundreds of hours of game and there is nothing left to discover.

Forgive my bad English is not my native language, I am Brazilian.

Also check out my other mod:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56047
author: IVANLEAL
